history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00486
FULL TITLE : AN ACT IMPLEMENTING CONCURRENT HOUSE RESOLUTION NO. 1 CALLING FOR A CONSTITUTIONAL CONVENTION, PROVIDING FOR ITS COMPOSITION AND OTHER DETAILS RELATING TO THE HOLDING OF THEREOF.
SHORT TITLE : Constitutional Convention Act Of 2016
ABSTRACT : Directs Congress to convene in ten (10) days upon approval of the Concurrent House Resolution calling for a Constitutional Convention for the purpose of electing twenty four (24) delegates to the Convention.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : MACAPAGAL ARROYO, GLORIA
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Romualdez (004 2016-08-01)2. Nieto (017 2016-08-31)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
